snippet: More than 100 pages of “war room notes” released by congressional investigators on Tuesday show how the White House reacted as it realized the extent of the problems with the health care website.
abstract: More than 100 pages of 'war room notes' released by congressional investigators offer insight into chaos that overwhelmed Obama administration as federal health insurance marketplace started up and officials realized that its problems could not be fixed quickly.
lead_paragraph: More than 100 pages of “war room notes” released by congressional investigators on Tuesday show how the White House reacted as it realized the extent of the problems with the health care website.

headline.main: Notes Reveal Chaotic White House Talks on Health Care Site
headline.print_headline: Notes Reveal Chaotic White House Talks on Health Care Site
